sentences.sContent: Tears of gratitude filled her eyes.
sentences.sCn: 她眼里充满感激的泪水。

sentences.sContent: ...The family turned to social media expressing their gratitude saying...
...my heartfelt gratitude to you is beyond words...
...I am writing to express my heartfelt gratitude for the continuous assistance you and your family have offered to me these years...

trans.tranCn: 感激， 感谢， 感恩
